website_summaries.verdict: Rechargeable, weatherproof, and magnetic. This set of road flares has everything you need for a roadside emergency.
pros: This set of road flares is exceptionally durable
The top of each flare also doubles as an LED flashlight, making it twice as useful as the competition
cons: Unfortunately this particular model is not Coast Guard approved for marine use, so they can't be used for boating

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived, I wanted to store them in the car fully charged. One would never show it was fully charged even though it was working perfectly. I was reluctant to keep it, as it might have caused problems in the future. The set was quickly replaced, and they all are working perfectly at this time.. Thankfully, I haven't had need of them yet, but I am glad to have them ready if I ever do. They are very solidly made and the brightness should be easily seen.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: I think a group of 5-6 LED flares would be the proper number to have.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the speed of delivery of the product. The LED flares are bright on all of the different modes; a great addition to the safety kits in my vehicles. My only negatives are that they are somewhat difficult to turn on and I would have expected to recharge them via a USB port on the flares. However, I have to remind myself that they are water resistant/ waterproof. A USB rechargeable port might defeat that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two of three flashers dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product and its potential to perform as advertised is negated by two of the three units dead on arrival. The non functioning units only light up in the 4 to 5 o'clock position. Depressing the on button does not advance the program into other modes. This product has great potential but if you send the seller a note about your issue - it's a dead letter box.
customer_reviews.author: Bisco R. Howell III

customer_reviews.title: JUNK !
customer_reviews.text: Product not as they say . Three pods are all that was sent and no way to charge them !
customer_reviews.author: Ramdriver

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Anything that can save a life, especially mine, gets 5 stars from me. These are great gifts for family and friends and really do what they say. No problems here whatsoever, and a great idea for a safety roadside system with a very useful magnetic base.
customer_reviews.author: Minds Eye Design

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Too dim for daytime, nighttime they're ok, loved the USB charger feature
customer_reviews.author: J man

customer_reviews.title: none wokked properly
customer_reviews.text: Of the three, one would not work at all. Two would not cycle to the work (white) lights Had to be returned
customer_reviews.author: PCSIdaho

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t show fully charged
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, especially because I work on the road a lot, but when I charge it, it doesn’t turn red to let me know when it’s fully charged. So I don’t know when they’re fully charged or if the batteries are defective so it doesn’t show it’s charged. Any help from manufacture would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Coreykawika

customer_reviews.title: Bright and useful but one unit not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Flares are very bright. The button requires a hard press to operate but I like that it won’t accidentally be activated and use up the charge if I ever need it in an emergency. My issue is that one of the flares came broken. I have contracted the seller and will update when I get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for the sister and the other for my mother. great item, no complication.
customer_reviews.author: WiitRiic

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: Buy the least expensive ones that you can find because they are all the same. These things work great and are bright in both night and day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought four sets!
customer_reviews.text: Came charged, we made sure fully charged. Really a great product! These will be in each of our vehicles! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gr8tGma

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Peace of Mind that knowing you have a set of Lights that's absolutely going to be seen if you break down. The rechargeableness of these lights is absolutely valuable. They're easy to recharge. All you have to remember is take them out plug them in and then put them back in the car after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on using S-O-S !!!!
customer_reviews.text: S-O-S flash doesn't operate correctly. Blinks out S,S,S. Both sets !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: The lights seem to be good quality and it performs well. I'm now testing how long it holds it charge.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hirt

customer_reviews.title: Don't order stand ups not bright
customer_reviews.text: Not very bright atleast tlnot the two pack stand ups i own the discs those are bright
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A definite safety item for vehicles with mechanical problems  or stopping to assist other motorists.
customer_reviews.text: A definate must for any driver and especially first responders. Strong magnet, rechargable AC & DC and BRIGHT light.
customer_reviews.author: Roy E. Davis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: I was useing the light. when I was done I put it on my truck to put away and forgot it there till I got back to work. The magnet is strong. It stayed on for 40 miles at 60-70mph.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it is rechargeable instead of buying batteries. The material is good, really essay to use by pressing only one button and charge fast.
customer_reviews.author: Hemar

customer_reviews.title: NOT COAST GUARD APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: NOT COAST GUARD APPROVED!!!! They work, no instructions came with them. Comments made it seem as though there were rechargeable batteries, Nope.
customer_reviews.author: Jlmerlav

customer_reviews.title: Lite my way
customer_reviews.text: Good size, I expected it to be smaller. It came charged and ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hardworking

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool, can't wait to pull over and help someone out and use my new lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lennon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Flare
customer_reviews.text: Read all about these, so had to get a set. Love them, cannot wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Burn

customer_reviews.title: Not tough enough
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this product for a couple months. So needless to say with that picture it cannot withstand being ran over. Even though the description say it can.
customer_reviews.author: William Redman

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Great product, lights are very bright and the magnets are strong, multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing and needed it for my old car and helped me with my car when i had a flat tire. Really bright color and would definitely recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: Parth

customer_reviews.title: Bad news !
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 sets of these lights and they will not charge
customer_reviews.author: Sharon baldridge

customer_reviews.title: Magnets are strong enough to stay on top of vehicle at 70 to 80 mph.
customer_reviews.text: Goid for what I needed,could be brighter but worth the money. Wish one more had come with the bundle.
customer_reviews.author: derek d lumley

customer_reviews.title: Bright.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets for our farm. Husband out a them on the back of whatever he is hauling to make it more visible. They certainly draw attention with how bright they are!
customer_reviews.author: catmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to have in the truck for an emergency...
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought these! Very bright and visible and a must have in any trunk!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: First use thoughts
customer_reviews.text: Was able to use this product tonight to land a medical emergency helicopter in a dark area. The helicopter pilot said he could see them from a distance and it was very easy for him to find the landing area. Worked so well my rescue unit is going to buy several sets to keep in our emergency response vehicles and in our scene response vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Finn

customer_reviews.title: This isn't good.
customer_reviews.text: Rechargability is the reason I wanted this item. The instructions for charging, while having the ability to be misunderstood, are either wrong, or item is defective, or both. I think I'll try for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: US bank

product_meta.title: Rechargeable LED Road Flares, Flashing Emergency Warning Light, Roadside Safety Disc, Magnetic Base With Storage Bag for Car Truck Boat -3 Pack
product_meta.description:
Color:USB RechargeableGoStar Rechargeable LED Road Flare is safer and ecologically better for our enviroment than flame styke emergency road flares.No spark,open flame,fumes or toxic chemicals are produced when using the Rechargeable LED Road Flare.
✔9 light flash patterns:Rotate;Quad flash;single blink;alternating blinks;sos rescue;steady on-high;steady on-low;2-LED flashlight;4-LED flashlight.
✔Rechargeable battery,no replaced battery needed.You can charge up by equipped car charger and wall charger.
✔Built-in 16 high brightness LED beads,up to 100 meters visible during the day and 900 meters visible during the night,even in the heavy rain and fog weather, this flare light can be seen 1600 Meters.
✔Perfect for traffic warning,poloce road mark,emergency vehicle discovery and helicopter landing,rescue activity,hiking,outdoor lighting,party.
With strong magnetic magent to stick on car or bicycle.

Specifics:
Diameter: 4 inches
Height: 1.18 inches
Weight: 0.43 pounds
Material: TPE/plastic
Voltage:3.7V
Battery type: in equiment lithium battery
Capacity:750mAh

Run time:
☀Rotate:7h
☀Quad flash:7h
☀Single blink:50h
☀Alternating blinks:7h
☀SOS rescue:12h
☀Steady on-high:4h
☀Steady on-low:30h
☀2-LED flashlight:7h
☀4-LED flashlight:5h

Package Includes:
3 X Warning Light
1 X Car cigarette lighter
1 X Wall US plug
1 X Manual

★Note★
Do not look directly at the light,may cause injury to your eyes.
Turn off all lights before charging.
feature_bullets: 【RECHARGEABLE DURABLE LED SAFETY LIGHT】 700mAh rechargeable with a car charger or an AC adapter (Included), compared to the battery powered safety flares, it is more durable and environmentally friendly.

【WATERPROOF, CRUSHPROOF & MAGNETIC】 Leave your safety flares in the pouring rain or run them over with your car - they're built to last! Plus, super strong rare earth magnets will keep them secured to the side of your truck or RV.
【HIGH VISIBILITY】 16 super bright LEDs (13 amber, 3 white), combined with 9 unique light modes, will ensure that you're seen by passing cars up to a mile away & can easily signal for assistance.

【FAMILY APPROVED】 Our emergency flares are safe, reusable & easy to use - without the risk of fire or burns. The best accessory for any cars, SUVs, Jeeps, motorcycle, bicycle, marine boating emergency kit. LED emergency lights for vehicles are a must have!
【1-YEAR WARRANTY & Risk-free Purchase】Your satisfaction is our last goal. Any further problems, be free to contact with us and we will try our best to solve the problems for you!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
